original_text: One day as Jesus was teaching the people in the temple courts and proclaiming the good news, the chief priests and the teachers of the law, together with the elders, came up to him.
korean_text: 하루는 예수께서 성전에서 백성을 가르치시며 복음을 전하실새 대제사장들과 서기관들이 장로들과 함께 가까이 와서

sentences.original_text: One day as Jesus was teaching the people
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날 예수께서 백성을 가르치고 계실 때

sentences.original_text: the chief priests and the teachers of the law
